Little_Rock.Albert Retan House: The Albert Retan House is a historic house at 506 North Elm Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. The house is a 2-1/2 story wood frame structure, with a complex cross-gabled hip roof configuration studded by gabled projections. The exterior is finished in wooden clapboards, and it has a single-story wraparound porch with turned posts and delicate woodwork balustrade and spindled frieze.
